mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matecomment(mcid, member_mid, mateboard_mbid, content, created_at) VALUES (mateComment_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberMid}, #{mateBoardMbid}, #{content}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT mc.mcid, mc.member_mid, mc.mateboard_mbid, m.nickname, m.payment_amount, mc.content, mc.created_at FROM matecomment mc JOIN mateboard mb ON mc.mateboard_mbid = mb.mbid JOIN member m ON mc.member_mid = m.mid WHERE mateboard_mbid = #{value} AND mc.status = '0' ORDER BY mc.created_at DESC
